headline: How The Hormel Foods (HRL) Story Is Evolving As Analyst Targets And Guidance Shift
summary: Hormel Foods’ analyst price target has been nudged from US$27.25 to US$27.00, a small 0.9% trim that still keeps the fair value marker close to prior views. Research commentary around the move points to a more fine tuned stance on Hormel’s execution and growth profile, rather than any broad change in sentiment. As you read on, you will see how this updated target fits into the wider analyst narrative and what to watch if you want to stay on top of how the story evolves. Analyst Price Targets...
